title:
Where can I find the most comprehensive list of what restaurants will be open and serving Thanksgiving meals on Thanksgiving day?



Thanks so much.

Pam DeGlow
text:
On Tuesday, food reporter Liz Biro will be posting this type of
information on PortCityFoodies.com, our food blog. She's compiling
that info now so please check the site on Tuesday the 17th.

Thanks!
